resources.string: Choose the number that is higher. \nQuestions can be repeated until you get 20 points.
Choose a Roman numeral that is larger. \nQuestions may be repeated until you reach 20 points.

"Congratulations! Level passed!\n Did you know that the number 7 is considered lucky by many people? There are 7 days of the week, 7 continents, 7 rainbow colors, 7 musical notes. \ n Also, this number is the favorite number of many people."
"Congratulations! Level passed! \n Did you know that there is no zero in Roman numbers?"
Choose a monkey. \nThe questions can be repeated until you get 20 points.
"Congratulations! Level passed! \n Did you know that .....?"
